name: Orchid Vase
description: Indigo on Celadon

name: Doi Breakfast Cushion - Magenta
description:
Doi is part of the Tattoo Cushion Range that I have designed in collaboration with Sop Moei Arts. Each pattern is inspired by the different motifs, which the Pwo Karen Men tattoo onto their body. The cushions are all hand made here in Chiang Mai and are sold unfilled.

Front: Silkscreen Print on 100% Belgian Linen

Reverse: 100% Thai Silk

Cushion Size: 30cm X 50cm.

Dry Clean Only.

Sop Moei Arts is a non-profit organization, which has been working with the Pwo Karen in Sop Moei district of Mae Hong Son Province, Thailand for the last 30 years.  The aim of Sop Moei Arts is to provide income generation for a people who have long faced problems such as poverty and malnutrition. 

*PLEASE NOTE: For Australia only. 
For international customers, you can purchase directly at www.sopmoeiarts.com

name: Sakura

Limited Edition

name: Kiku Stationery Cabinet Set
description:
**NEW** This design is based off my painting Kiku, which was inspired by my recent trip to Japan. With a beautiful assortment of blank cards, thank you notes, envelopes and seals, this stationery set is a wonderful gift to any letter-writing lover. 

Comes with 6 blank cards, 6 thank you notes, envelopes and 18 decorative seals all in a lovely keepsake box. The inside lid of the box includes the quote: "Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind in the present moment" - Buddha.

6 X Thank You Cards
6 X Blank Cards
18 Foil Stickers

Size: 3 3/4 in. x 4 3/4 in. (95 mm x 121 mm)

Envelope: Orange with printed liner

For all US Customers, please order directly at www.papyrusonline.com

© Chris Chun Design Pty Ltd 2012. All Rights Reserved. Any reproduction is strictly prohibited without permission of the copyright holder.

name: Koi Embroidered Fabric Card
description:
**NEW ARRIVAL**

This card is from the Riches of Nature Collection which I designed for Papyrus. There are 6 designs in the range. Each card features my original artwork which has been printed onto satin fabric with embroidery details. It's a very unique card for that someone special and the card can be framed as a work of art afterwards.

Size: 5 1/2 in. x 7 1/2 in. (140 mm x 190 mm)

Blank Inside

Matching coloured envelope with patterned lining

FREE SHIPPING!

For all US customers, you can buy directly from www.papyrusonline.com

© Chris Chun Design Pty Ltd 2012. All Rights Reserved. Any reproduction is strictly prohibited without permission of the copyright holder.

name: York
description:
“These seriously cool dog portraits are painted by Thai Artist GEE from Bangkok. Each hound has their own distinct personality with lots of attitude! I love the spontaneity of the brushstrokes, the urban colour palette and laidback vibe.

Acrylic on Cardboard 
Size:	20cm X 20cm 
Framed with off white mountboard and dark teak wood frame. No glass. 
(The mount board is museum archive quality and is off white, not cream as some computer screens may show)

FREE SHIPPING - AUSTRALIA ONLY

© Jirawat Pramphet. All Rights Reserved. Any reproduction is strictly prohibited without permission of the copyright holder.

name: Kimono Rose
description:
"This painting features a small blue bird sitting in a full, decorative flower. It reminds me of the pretty kimono fabrics found in the markets in Kyoto which is made into various products. The ribbon adds a touch of romance"

Mixed Media on Paper - Ink, Gouache, Origami and Tissue Papers.

Size of Actual Artwork: 29.5cm X 20.5cm
Size of Mountboard: 50.3cm X 41.3cm
(The mount board is museum archive quality and is off white, not cream as some computer screens may show)

name: Ping Nakara
description:
"When we first arrived in Chiang Mai, we stayed at a beautiful boutique hotel by the River Ping. The dining room was full of orchids in blue and white ceramic pots. Stunning!" 

This is part of a series of 5 etchings I printed with C.A.P Studio (Chiang Mai Art & Paper) here in Chiang Mai. It is inspired by the classic blue and white ceramics found in Asia.

Limited edition of 30. 
Size of Actual Print: 34.5cm X 28cm. 

FREE SHIPPING

© Chris Chun Design Pty Ltd 2013. All Rights Reserved. Any reproduction is strictly prohibited without permission of the copyright holder.

name: The Wise One
description:
"The owl is such a mystical and fascinating creature. It is also considered to be a symbol of wisdom even though they have small brains!" 

This is part of a series of 5 etchings I printed with C.A.P Studio (Chiang Mai Art & Paper) here in Chiang Mai. It is inspired by the classic blue and white ceramics found in Asia.

Limited edition of 30. 

Size of Actual Print: 34.5cm X 28cm. 

FREE SHIPPING

© Chris Chun Design Pty Ltd 2012. All Rights Reserved. Any reproduction is strictly prohibited without permission of the copyright holder.

name: Flowering Prosperity
description:
"Oranges represent abundant happiness and prosperity. The tree on the pear shaped vase symbolises growth." 

This is part of a series of 5 etchings I printed with C.A.P Studio (Chiang Mai Art & Paper) here in Chiang Mai. It is inspired by the classic blue and white ceramics found in Asia.

Limited edition of 30. 
Size of Actual Print: 34.5cm X 28cm. 

FREE SHIPPING

© Chris Chun Design Pty Ltd 2013. All Rights Reserved. Any reproduction is strictly prohibited without permission of the copyright holder.

name: The Artist's Table
description:
"This is a snapshot of my desk which documents my time living and travelling here in Asia. Each object represents a special place I have visited. " 

This is part of a series of 5 etchings I printed with C.A.P Studio (Chiang Mai Art & Paper) here in Chiang Mai. It is inspired by the classic blue and white ceramics found in Asia.

Limited edition of 30. 
Size of Actual Print: 34.5cm X 28cm. 

FREE SHIPPING

© Chris Chun Design Pty Ltd 2013. All Rights Reserved. Any reproduction is strictly prohibited without permission of the copyright holder.

name: Fragrant Beauty
description:
"The beauty of nature and everything within, changes with the seasons. You can almost smell the fragrance of the flowers. But behind the surface lies the Chinese symbolism of the natural world where the birds, insects and fish depict happiness and good fortune." 

This is part of a series of 5 etchings I printed with C.A.P Studio (Chiang Mai Art & Paper) here in Chiang Mai. It is inspired by the classic blue and white ceramics found in Asia.

Limited edition of 30. 
Size of Actual Print: 34.5cm X 28cm. 

FREE SHIPPING

© Chris Chun Design Pty Ltd 2013. All Rights Reserved. Any reproduction is strictly prohibited without permission of the copyright holder.

name: Ceramic Spoon - Indigo Dots
description:
How gorgeous are these hand made ceramic spoons? Each spoon is hand made, individually glazed and unique - no 2 spoons are the same. They're all made by local Thai artist Jirawong Wongtrangan.

I thought that these spoons would make a lovely gift idea for serving sugar, jam, cream or sauces. Or what about mounting them in a simple box wooden frame for the kitchen?

This spoon is 13cm long and features a hand stamped handle with hand painting.

I am pretty sure that these are not dishwasher or microwave wave safe. Hand wash only.

FREE SHIPPING!

name: Ceramic Spoon - Crescent
description:
How gorgeous are these hand made ceramic spoons? Each spoon is hand made, individually glazed and unique - no 2 spoons are the same. They're all made by local Thai artist Jirawong Wongtrangan.

I thought that these spoons would make a lovely gift idea for serving sugar, jam, cream or sauces. Or what about mounting them in a simple box wooden frame for the kitchen?

This spoon is 12cm long and features a hand stamped handle with hand painting.

I am pretty sure that these are not dishwasher or microwave wave safe. Hand wash only.

FREE SHIPPING!

name: Fusia - Eastern Breeze
description:
Chris has created a new range of art cards called Fusia for renowned UK publisher Woodmansterne.

The beauty of nature and everything within changes with the seasons. Birds & Butterflies of every kaleidoscope. Flowers grow in abundance. Koi swim happily in patterned, ethereal waters. Inspired from Chris's travels to Asia and a love of antique textiles, his paintings reflect an inherent joy and harmony. 

140mm X 140mm Blank Card with Envelope.
Printed in the UK.

FREE SHIPPING - AUSTRALIA ONLY

name: 'Kyoto Blossom'
description:
Mixed Media - Acrylic, Ink, Gouache, Origami and Tissue Paper Collage on Paper. Double Mounted with Museum Archive Board, Perspex and 9cm white box wooden frame.

Size: 95 X 95cm

PLEASE NOTE: As with all works on paper, the painting cannot be hung in direct sunlight or really bright areas as the colours will fade after a period of time.

'This painting represents the beauty and tranquility of Japan - one of my favourite places to visit!"

name: 'Fruit from Chiang Mai'
description:
Mixed Media - Acrylic, Ink, Gouache, Origami, Gold Leaf and Tissue Paper Collage on Paper. Double Mounted with Museum Archive Board, Perspex and 2cm dark wooden frame.

Size: 70 X 70cm

PLEASE NOTE: As with all works on paper, the painting cannot be hung in direct sunlight or really bright areas as the colours will fade after a period of time.

'This painting reminds me of the beautiful and delicious fruit platters in Thailand"

name: 'An Angel at my Table'
description:
Mixed Media on Canvas - Acrylic, Sand, Wax, Hand Embroidery and Stitching. The painting has a luminous pearlescent sheen.

60cm X 60cm

"The perfect afternoon of writing postcards with tea and cake"

name: 'Seafood Odyssey'
description:
Mixed Media on Canvas - Acrylic, Sand, Wax, Hand Embroidery and Stitching.

Size: 100 X 80cm

"This painting represents all the fantastic seafood we have in Australia."

name: Liquid Gold
description:
Mixed Media on Canvas - Acrylic, Sand, Wax, Hand Embroidery and Stitching. The painting has a luminous pearlescent sheen.

80cm X 80cm

"This painting was inspired by my trip to Epernay and Rheims in Champagne. We had champagne with everything from takeaway pizza to Michelin Star Food. You don't need an excuse to drink champagne as long as it is the real thing! My favourite is Krug, in case you're wondering"

name: 'Le Chocolat' Diptych
description:
Mixed Media on Canvas - Acrylic, Sand, Wax, Hand Embroidery and Stitching. This is a diptych.

25cm X 25cm

"There are 4 basic food groups: Dark Chocolate, Milk Chocolate, White Chocolate and Chocolate Truffles!"

FREE SHIPPING - AUSTRALIA ONLY

© Chris Chun Design Pty Ltd 2012. All Rights Reserved. Any reproduction is strictly prohibited without permission of the copyright holder.

name: '1000 Blossoms' Limited Edition Cushion
description:
'1000 Blossoms'
30cm X 30cm Square Cushion with Silk Piping and Invisible Zipper.
Fabric Front & Back: Digital Print on High Quality Bridal Satin from Japan. 

This cushion is a piece of artwork. 
There is only a limited edition of 100 available worldwide.

FREE SHIPPING - AUSTRALIA ONLY

Care Instructions:
Dry Cleanable only. Do not handwash. Do not machine wash. Do not bleach. Do not tumble dry. May be ironed on reverse side of fabric only. Keep away from abrasive and sharp objects as fabric may mark. Keep out of direct sunlight.

There is only a limited edition of 100 available worldwide.

FREE SHIPPING - AUSTRALIA ONLY

Care Instructions:

name: 'Hanami' Limited Edition Beaded Cushion
description:
'Hanami'
30cm X 90cm Rectangle Cushion with Silk Piping.
Fabric: Digital Print on High Quality Bridal Satin from Japan with Hand Beading. 
Proudly Made in Australia.

This cushion is a piece of artwork. 
There is only a limited edition of 100 available worldwide.

FREE SHIPPING - WORLDWIDE

**Please note that this cushion will be sent unfilled**

Care Instructions:
Dry Cleanable only. Do not handwash. Do not machine wash. Do not bleach. Do not tumble dry. May be ironed on reverse side of fabric only. Keep away from abrasive and sharp objects as fabric may mark. Keep out of direct sunlight.

name: 'Longevity' Eye Pillow - LIMITED EDITION
description:
*FREE POSTAGE*

Chris says: "Please help me restore sight to those in need. There are only 35 eye pillows left to be sold in this limited edition. For each online sale of an Eye Pillow made from our boutique, we will donate 20% to The Fred Hollows Foundation."

'Longevity' Limited Edition of 250 worldwide. Featuring the original artwork of Chris Chun, each pillow is digitally printed onto the front and has 100% silk satin on the reverse. It is beautifully piped and filled with 100% Natural Lavender & Flaxseed from the Lavender Station in Mudgee, NSW. Proudly Made in Australia.

Each pillow comes with a signed card of authenticity. 

$25 can restore sight in the developing world, so as well as buying something special, you have also contributed towards giving the gift of sight to a fellow human being. 

Namaste.
